entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
